title: Import AI paths into font softwares to create font file
content:
Hi all,

This may be a beginner question. But I found that I had created a set of font in AI.  
I wanna import these paths to softwares so that I could create a real font file.  
I have downloaded typetool but couldn’t find such function.  
Is there any software I can achieve this?

A million thanks

Edward

 [‹ Our Latest Project!](http://web.archive.org/web/20080101095257/http:/www.typophile.com/node/38281 "Go to previous forum topic") [Adrian Frutiger ›](http://web.archive.org/web/20080101095257/http:/www.typophile.com/node/38261 "Go to next forum topic")
author: marcadonbalon

comments.content:
[http://groups.msn.com/fontlab/tipsandtricks.msnw?action=get\_message&mvie...](http://web.archive.org/web/20080101095257/http:/groups.msn.com/fontlab/tipsandtricks.msnw?action=get_message&mview=0&ID_Message=2675 "http://groups.msn.com/fontlab/tipsandtricks.msnw?action=get\_message&mview=0&ID\_Message=2675")

I used to do Illustrator drawings before importing to TypeTool, but it is much, much better (and easier) to draw in TypeTool/FontLab instead.
thank you very very much for your help!
